content.rendered:
Directed by Nandha Periasamy. Nanda Periyasamy

Written by Nanda Periyasamy

Star Daniel Balaji (Karuppan). Cheran. Nakkalites Dhanam. Gautham Karthik. Mounica (Thangam). Shivathmika Rajashekar (Viji). Saravanan (Kasi). Saravanan. Sindhujaavijii (Vasanthi ( sindhuja viji) (as Sindhuja Viji)). Snehan (Dharman). Venba (Selvi). Vignesh (Palani)

Language Tamil

Producers P. Ranganathan

Production OracleMovies. Sri Vaari Film
